#Zigbin Installation.

= Installation =

1. Checkout the [http://code.google.com/p/zigbin/source/checkout zigbin source code] and download the [http://zigbin.googlecode.com/files/2008-04-09-zigbin_zigglobal.zip zigbin sql dump].

2. Put your the [http://code.google.com/p/zigbin/source/checkout zigbin source code] unto your web directory and run the [http://zigbin.googlecode.com/files/2008-04-09-zigbin_zigglobal.zip zigbin sql dump] to your database.

3. [http://code.google.com/p/zigbin/wiki/Configuration Configure your zigbin installation]
